document_data.mainbody:
One Old Crones Simperings Seventy Seasons at Court was a memoir penned penned by Marchioness Althea Bleth of the noble Bleth family of Suzail in the early 14 century DR.
One Old Crones Simperings Seventy Seasons at Court was a book that detailed the life, intrigues, and ruminations of the Suzailan courtier Lady Althea Bleth, who spent seventy years amidst the Forest Kingdoms High Court. The work saw print in the .
